Title: SU(6) grand unification of 3-3-1 model
Abstract: © 2018, Springer International Publishing AG, part of Springer Nature.We discuss a sequential variant of the SU(3)c × SU(3)L × U(1)X [1] model which fits within a minimal SU(6) grand unification. Interestingly, this minimal SU(6) embedding can allow a SU(3)c × SU(3)L × U(1)X symmetry breaking scale within the reach of LHC and with seesaw-type neutrino masses.
